attributes.additional_details: Continued.... Persions. (Which they also breed) .anything looking like a fluffy tabby will be advertised as a maine coone. They sell sick and/or under age kittens which many of have died. They even telk people kittens are ready to leave their mums and go to them as young as 4 weeks old.  They threaten anyone that tries to stop them.
attributes.background: These people con people into giving them their kittens pretending they are either going to their new forever homes or they pose as a rescue. They get kittens either for free or very cheap.... They will then try to re sell the kittens at extortionate prices often stating they are crossed with ragdoll

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
